resources.string: Before getting started, select how many digits you want to play with. Depending on the digits you chose, the game picks random number with distinct numbers and no 0 in it. Your mission is to find this number. After every number you guess, you will be shown the count of digits that you guessed right and wrong. + sign means how many numbers you found and that they are at correct place. - sign means how many numbers you found and that they are not at correct place. 0 means that you could not find any number at all. + signs are always shown first, later - signs follow. The order of this signs is not the order of the numbers you guessed.
